views.markdown:
Unicode 14.0 (iOS 15.4) Apple's AppleColorEmoji font for EmojiFontManager.


Regular version of this font has all emoji images in PNG format and better compressed than Apple's EMJC image compression.


HD version of this font includes additional 160x160 PNG emoji images. They work best if you usually want to see emojis in large size.
- Optimizing PNG images further with oxipng
- Regular version: Support SoftBank codepoints, Keep only emoji of sizes 96x96, 64x64 and 40x40, same as native
